name: SnowBall (itch) (NovaKnight531)
description:
Play as a snowball, as you role around the snowy abyss solving puzzles. Play through the game to discover who and where you really are.

Note - This game was made in a 72 hour period for the MashUpGameJam on the theme of Size Matters. All assets were made by NovaKnight531.

Controls:

A / D - Move

E - Split

R - Restart the current level

Esc - Pause / Unpause

The more you move the more you will grow

The fire will melt you

If one of you one of splits die you may then split again

You can knock over trees if you are big enough
